# INTERIOR::SET_IS_EXTERIOR_ONLY

## Summary
Set flag on object to indicate it should never go into an interior

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entityID
* **BOOL** isExteriorOnly

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Jenkins hash _might_ be 0xFC227584.
